wikipedia_page.main: Anne Johnson, a British archaeologist and historical researcher, is a specialist in the archaeology of Roman forts of the early empire in Britain and the German Provinces. She studied archaeology at University College, Cardiff. Her PhD dissertation has been published in Britain (1983) and Germany (1987). Since 1989 she has worked as an archaeological and historical consultant in Oxford. Other publications include work on Roman military granaries.

response: Anne Johnson Davis (died July 29, 2010) was an American author and public speaker who in 2008 published Hell Minus One,http://www.hellminusone.com/ a memoir about being a childhood victim of Satanic ritual abuse (SRA). In the book, Davis's abuse was corroborated through a confession by her mother and stepfather made to Lt. Detective Matt Jacobson of the Utah Attorney General's office.
Anne Johnson is a British archaeologist and researcher.
